DOC.criteria: Be least 18 year old . Signed Informed Consent Investigator record Case Report Form ( CRF ) appropriate space . Require visual correction eye ( monovision allow monofit ) . Have contact lens spherical distance requirement +6.00D 9.00D eye . Astigmatism 1.00D less good eye 1.50D less eye . Be correctable visual acuity 20/30 ( 6/9 ) good eye . Have normal eye evidence abnormality disease . Requires concurrent ocular medication . Any systemic illness would contraindicate lens wear medical treatment would affect vision successful lens wear . Clinically significant corneal edema , corneal vascularisation , tarsal abnormality , bulbar injection abnormality cornea would contraindicate contact lens wear . Worn lens extend wear basis last 3 month . Diabetic . Infectious disease ( e.g. , hepatitis , tuberculosis ) immunosuppressive disease ( e.g. , HIV ) . Polymethyl methacrylate ( PMMA ) rigid gaspermeable ( RGP ) lens wear previous 8 week . Has refractive surgery . Has eye injury/surgery within 8 week immediately prior enrolment study . Abnormal lacrimal secretion .
